articles.title: China's consumer prices fall more than expected in August as deflation woes persist - CNBC
articles.description: China's consumer prices fell more than expected in August while deflation in factory-gate prices persisted, as calls mounted for Beijing to ramp up stimulus measures.

articles.title: Trump’s tariffs seen cutting into China sales of US companies, survey finds - AP News
articles.description: Many U.S. companies in China expect sales to take a hit this year because of the tariffs imposed by U.S. President Donald Trump and China's retaliatory measures. This is according to a survey by the American Chamber of Commerce in Shanghai, released Wednesday…

articles.title: Apple Stock Slides After Surprise-Free iPhone 17 Reveal - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: Apple unveiled its fall product lineup on Tuesday, including the iPhone 17 series smartphones. Apple stock dipped after the event.

articles.description: A federal judge has rejected the $1.5 billion settlement that Anthropic agreed to pay authors for allegedly using pirated copies of their books for AI training.

articles.title: U.S. employers added 911,000 fewer jobs than first reported, new BLS data shows - The Washington Post
articles.description: The revisions arrive as government statistics have become increasingly politicized. Last month, Trump took the unprecedented step of firing the BLS commissioner, Erika McEntarfer, over weak jobs data.
